mapper.select:
select count(*) from expertation t left join product p on p.id=t.product_id left join writer_user wu on t.user_id=wu.id where 1=1
and t.org_id=#{orgId}
and wu.realname like concat('%',#{queryName},'%' )
and t.product_id =#{productId}
and t.online_progress =0
and t.online_progress in(1,4)
and t.online_progress in(2,5)
and t.online_progress =3
